phrase.text: The maximum total stake permitted per round is [max]. Please adjust your bet selection.
You have been disconnected from the gaming server. Please check your internet connection. Game will be closed now.
You have reached the maximum winnings limit of [max]. Your current game will now end and your winnings will be credited to your balance.
We have not been able to place your bet. Please check your updated balance.
One or more of your bets is incomplete. Please make sure you complete all your bets.
You are part way through a game. Please click to resume.
You do not have sufficient credits to place this bet. Please check your credit balance.

Iron Man Welcome to Iron Man, the brilliant new five reel 25 line slot inspired by the famous Marvel comics' super hero! Multiply your winnings in the various extra features added to this game. Win cash, Free Games and Free Game win multipliers in the thrilling Missile Attack bonus round. The Expanded Wild and Mixed Pay features help to further increase the winnings.
GAME PLAY * Iron Man has 25 win lines. * Click the + and - buttons below Bet/Line to increase the size of your stake per line. * Click the Lines button to increase the number of active win lines by one. When all lines are activated, clicking the button again resets the selection to one active win line. Win lines can also be activated by using the numbered buttons on either side of the reels. Selecting a high win line includes all the lower ones too. For example, selecting win line 6 also activates lines 1 through 5. Clicking Bet Max activates all win lines with the maximum bet per line and spins the reels. * Total bet per game round = bet per line x active win lines * Click the Spin button to start your game with the current selection of lines and line bet. During the reel spins the Spin button changes into Stop. Clicking Stop ends the spin animation and immediately displays the spin result.
BONUS FEATURES Mixed Pay Feature * The reel symbols feature two different images of Iron Man in his suit * Mixed Pay winning combinations must begin from the leftmost reel * Mixed Pay winning combinations must contain at least one of both Iron Man symbols, which must appear consecutively on an active win line
Expanding Wild Feature * The two Iron Man symbols appear stacked (placed on top of one another) on reels 2, 3 and 4 * When all three positions of a reel are covered by the identical Iron Man symbols, then the reel becomes Expanding Wild for that particular spin * All positions of the expanded reel can stand for any other symbol, except Scatter, to form winning combinations * Expanding Wild can also occur during the Free Games
Missile Attack Bonus Game * The Missile Attack bonus game occurs when three or more Scatter symbols appear anywhere on the reels * Click to Start to enter the bonus game * Pick which of the 12 missiles to shoot down by clicking on it * Picking a missile earns a prize: * A cash prize ranging from 1 to 5 times the total bet * A number of Free Games ranging from 5 to 8 * A Free Games wins multiplier ranging from 2 to 3 - all wins are multiplied by that multiplier during the Free Games * A bar at the upper edge of the game window summarizes the prizes * Once you have earned both the number of Free Games and the Free Games win multiplier, the bonus game ends * Click Continue on the screen summarizing the Missile Attack bonus game winnings to start the Free Games
Free Games Feature * The number of Free Games and the win multiplier for the Free Games are won in the Missile Attack bonus game * Free Games are played at the win lines and bet of the spin that triggered the Missile Attack bonus game * After each Free Games spin, the win is displayed in the Win field * The Free Games Win field shows the winnings accumulated from the Free Games * If three Scatters appear anywhere on the reels during the Free Games, 10 Free Games are added to the remaining ones. The Missile Attack bonus game is not retriggered during the Free Games * More Free Games can be won indefinitely * After all Free Games have been completed, a result board summarizes the winnings. Game win shows the winnings that were received from the spin that triggered the Missile Attack bonus game. Feature win shows the winnings that were received from the Free Games. Total win shows the aggregate winnings (Game Win and Feature Win added up).
RULES * LINES can be changed by clicking the Lines button * BET amount can be ch anged by clicking the Bet per Line button * SPIN begins the game with the current BET and LINES * BET MAX begins the game with the maximum LINES and current BET * Payouts are displayed on the PAYTABLE * Payline wins are multiplied by the amount bet per line * Highest win amount is paid on each selected payline * Scatter wins are multiplied by total bet and added to payline wins * Feature wins are added to Scatter and payline wins * Win combinations pay from left to right only, except Scatter wins
GENERAL NOTES: * This game has a Return to Player of 95.084% * Malfunction voids all pays and plays * If you are disconnected from the Internet in the middle of a base game, the spin will be automatically completed. * If you are disconnected from the Internet during a bonus round or Free Games, you will be automatically directed back to the game after you log back into the casino so you can continue the game.
INSUFFICIENT BALANCE FOR THE REQUESTED BET
[X] SCATTERS WIN [W] AND START THE BONUS!
[X] SCATTERS WIN [W] AND [S] EXTRA FREE GAMES!
Sorry, there has been an error. The game is reloaded.
Please enter the number of spins.
